name: Deeper and Deeper in the Woods
name_original: Deeper and Deeper in the Woods
description:
Luna needs to find the castle that is deep in the woods. To do that, she has to navigate deeper and deeper into the woods following clues.

Game made for LD48 - Ludum Dare 48 (Jam)

Playable in browser. Will also create a Windows, Mac and Linux version. Base resolution 960x576.
